==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|てん|へん|ち|い|k2=ぺん|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|天変|tr1=tenpen|t1=a change or [[abnormality]] in the [[heavens]]|地異|tr2=chii|t2=a bad change in or on the earth}}.<ref>{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

===Pronunciation===
* {{ja-pron|てんぺんちい|y=o|acc=5|acc_ref=NHK}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|てんぺんち.い|kyu=天變地異}}

# {{lb|ja|idiomatic|sort=てんぺんちい}} an [[extraordinary]] [[natural]] [[occurrence]]: a [[catastrophe]], a [[calamity]]
#: {{ja-usex|'''天変地異'''が起きた。|'''てんぺんちい''' が おきた。|An earth-shattering incident occurred.}}
